description: Fundamental half guard sweep using the underhook to drive opponent over
key_points: Get on your side with strong underhook|Control far hip or belt|Drive into opponent while elevating with leg|Follow to top position
common_mistakes: Staying flat on back|Weak underhook|Not controlling far hip|Poor timing

description: Classic Roberto Gordo sweep grabbing far leg and coming to knees
key_points: Establish underhook and get on side|Grab opponent's far foot|Come to knees while holding foot|Drive forward for sweep
common_mistakes: Not securing foot|Weak underhook|Coming up too slowly|Losing grip on foot

description: Neutral standing position from half guard where both fighters have underhooks
key_points: Get to knees with strong underhook|Establish collar tie or overhook with free arm|Fight for dominant angle|Attack single leg or back take
common_mistakes: Losing underhook battle|Head position too low|No secondary control|Passive position

description: Transitioning from dogfight position to back control by circling behind opponent
key_points: From dogfight, fight for superior underhook|Circle toward opponent's back|Establish seatbelt grip|Insert hooks for back control
common_mistakes: Losing underhook|Not moving feet|Telegraphing|Poor timing
counters: Turning to face|Hip switch|Dropping back to guard

description: Eddie Bravo lockdown sweep using leg entanglement and hip elevation
key_points: Establish lockdown on trapped leg|Secure underhook on hip and far leg|Whip up extension while holding far leg|Come to top or crotch ripper position
common_mistakes: Weak lockdown|Not securing hip|Insufficient explosion|Poor grip on far leg

description: Eddie Bravo half guard control with legs triangled around opponent's trapped leg
key_points: Triangle legs around opponent's trapped leg|Bottom foot hooks opponent's ankle|Top foot hooks own ankle|Extend to stretch opponent's base
common_mistakes: Loose leg configuration|Foot not hooking ankle|Extension not maintained|Flat positioning
counters: Pulling leg free|Heavy crossface|Passing over lockdown

description: Extension movement from lockdown creating space and sweeping opportunity
key_points: From lockdown, secure underhook|Extend hips and legs simultaneously|Elevate opponent's trapped leg|Follow to sweep or electric chair
common_mistakes: Insufficient extension|No underhook|Poor timing|Not following through

description: Half guard variation with shin across opponent's torso creating distance and framing
key_points: Position knee across opponent's chest/belly|Foot hooks outside hip|Frame with arms|Maintain angle and distance
common_mistakes: Knee too low|Foot not hooked|Flat on back|Poor frames
counters: Smashing through shield|Going around knee|Knee slice

description: Sweep from knee shield when opponent posts hand by trapping and rolling under
key_points: From knee shield, wait for opponent to post|Trap posting arm with overhook|Roll underneath opponent|Follow to top position
common_mistakes: Not trapping arm|Poor timing|Insufficient roll|Losing shield position

description: Using knee shield to off-balance opponent and take the back
key_points: From knee shield, drive knee into opponent|When they resist, duck under arm|Circle to back|Establish seatbelt and hooks
common_mistakes: Telegraphing movement|Losing knee position|Slow transition|Poor angle

description: Setting up triangle choke from knee shield position when opponent reaches over
key_points: From knee shield, bait opponent to reach over|Shoot hip up and lock triangle|Adjust angle and finish|Can also armbar from here
common_mistakes: Poor bait|Triangle too loose|Not cutting angle|Flat position

description: Diving underneath opponent into deep half guard position
key_points: From standard half, duck under opponent's arm|Dive head toward their far knee|Wrap arm around their leg|Position head near knee
common_mistakes: Head too high|Poor arm position|Not committing|Losing half guard control

description: Deep half guard sweep grabbing belt and rolling under opponent
key_points: From deep half, grab opponent's belt|Roll underneath them toward trapped leg|Use belt grip to pull them over|Come to top position
common_mistakes: Loose belt grip|Not getting deep enough|Poor roll|Opponent posting

description: Deep half sweep controlling far leg like holding a tray
key_points: From deep half, control far leg at ankle|Lift leg like holding a tray|Roll toward that leg|Come to top using leg control
common_mistakes: Poor leg control|Not rolling correctly|Losing deep half position|Weak tray grip

description: Transitioning from deep half guard to X-guard for different attack angles
key_points: From deep half, reguard to X-guard position|Insert hook behind knee|Other leg pushes hip|Attack with X-guard sweeps
common_mistakes: Losing leg control|Poor hook placement|Slow transition|Not securing grips

description: Attacking kimura when opponent bases with hand in half guard
key_points: Control opponent's wrist when they post|Sit up and figure-four grip|Fall to hip maintaining control|Rotate arm behind back
common_mistakes: Not sitting up enough|Loose grip|Allowing posture|Opponent pulling arm
counters: Straightening arm|Pulling arm|Jumping to other side

description: Using kimura grip to sweep when opponent defends the submission
key_points: Secure kimura grip|When opponent defends by posting other hand|Use grip to off-balance and sweep|Follow to top with submission or position
common_mistakes: Losing kimura grip|Not timing correctly|Weak control|Not following

description: Front headlock choke when opponent's head drops in half guard
key_points: When opponent's head drops, wrap neck|Secure chin-strap or blade grip|Control with half guard|Crunch and finish
common_mistakes: Head not in armpit|Loose grip|Not controlling with guard|Poor angle
counters: Posturing up|Pulling head out|Passing to side

description: Techniques to maintain half guard when opponent is passing
key_points: Keep knee between opponent's legs|Frame on hip and shoulder|Hip escape to create angle|Fight for underhook
common_mistakes: Flat on back|No frames|Legs too loose|Not moving hips

description: Recovering full closed guard from half guard position
key_points: Create space with frames and hip escape|Insert free leg hook|Close guard around opponent's waist|Reestablish closed guard attacks
common_mistakes: Not creating space|Forcing without space|Poor timing|Loose guard

description: Lucas Leite coyote half guard sweep using underhook and hip control
key_points: Secure deep underhook|Control at hip or belt|Come to knees driving into opponent|Continue to top or back take
common_mistakes: Weak underhook|Poor hip control|Not driving|Stopping halfway

description: Eddie Bravo setup entering twister position from lockdown half guard
key_points: From lockdown with underhook|Secure head and arm control|Begin rotation toward twister|Can finish twister or take back
common_mistakes: Losing lockdown|Poor head control|Insufficient rotation|Opponent escaping

description: Sweep using knee shield pressure against opponent's shoulder to off-balance
key_points: From knee shield, pressure into shoulder|When opponent resists, redirect and sweep|Use their resistance against them|Follow to top
common_mistakes: Poor angle|Insufficient pressure|Bad timing|Losing shield

description: Defensive recovery position when losing position in half guard
key_points: Knees tight to chest|Frames protecting neck and body|Keep half guard hook|Work to escape or recover better position
common_mistakes: Extending legs|Poor frames|Flat position|Giving up hook

description: Leg compression attack from half guard position targeting opponent's calf
key_points: From half guard or lockdown|Insert shin behind opponent's knee|Force heel toward their buttocks|Apply compression on calf
common_mistakes: Poor shin placement|Not controlling leg|Insufficient pressure|Illegal at lower belts

description: Rolling under opponent from deep half to sweep and come to top
key_points: From deep half, commit to rolling under|Use momentum to take opponent over|Control trapped leg throughout|Come to top position
common_mistakes: Not committing|Poor control|Stopping mid-roll|Losing position

description: Similar to closed guard hip bump performed from half guard position
key_points: When opponent posts hand in half guard|Sit up explosively|Use momentum to sweep|Follow to top position
common_mistakes: Poor timing|Not explosive|Weak underhook|Opponent based well

description: Half guard variation facing opponent's legs rather than head
key_points: From half guard, invert to face legs|Maintain half guard control|Attack leg locks or sweep|Transition to other positions
common_mistakes: Losing half guard|Poor timing|Exposed to passes|Not controlling leg

description: Using sleeve grip to drag opponent's arm and take angle for sweep or back
key_points: Control sleeve from half guard|Drag arm across your body|Use momentum to sweep or take back|Follow to dominant position
common_mistakes: Loose grip|Not following|Poor timing|Staying flat
counters: Pulling arm back|Strong base|Countering with pressure

description: Setting up guillotine choke from knee shield when opponent's head drops
key_points: From knee shield when head drops|Wrap neck quickly|Maintain knee shield while securing|Finish or transition
common_mistakes: Head not deep enough|Losing knee shield|Loose grip|Poor angle
